synopsis: a group of friends embark on a camping trip for a ten-year high school reunion. their celebration soon turns into a battle for survival when they realize that the locals, who are not what they seem, are hunting them down.

title: Loving Annabelle
synopsis: annabelle is the wise-beyond-her-years newcomer to an exclusive catholic girls school. having been expelled from her first two schools she's bound to stir some trouble. sparks fly though when sexual chemistry appears between her and the head of her dorm and english teacher, simone bradley. annabelle pursues her relentlessly and until the end the older woman manages to avoid the law.

title: Foreign Exchange
synopsis: four high school friends plan to ride out their senior year taking easy classes, including a program for housing foreign exchange students and eventually all attending ohio state. hurdles befall each of the four: grades, higher aspirations, love. is it the foreign exchange students that learn from their host or the hosts that do more of the learning?

title: Strike!
synopsis: in the 1960s, a group of friends at an all girls school learn that their school is going to be combined with a nearby all boys school. they concoct a plan to save their school while dealing with everyday problems along the way.

title: Recess: School's Out
synopsis: it's the most exciting time of year at third street elementary-- the end of the school year! but boredom quickly sets in for protagonist tj detweiler, as his friends are headed for summer camp. one day, while passing by the school on his bike, he notices a green glow coming from the school's auditorium. this is the work of the insidious ex-principal of third street, phillium benedict and his gang of ninjas and secret service look-alikes! benedict is planning to get rid of summer vacation using his newly-acquired tractor beam, which he stole from the us military base in an effort to raise us test scores, and it's up to the recess gang to stop him!

title: April Showers
synopsis: a look inside a tragedy through the eyes of a survivor. based on actual events, april showers is about picking up the pieces in the direct aftermath of school violence

title: It Happened in Brooklyn
synopsis: danny has been in the army for 4 years, yet all he thinks about is brooklyn and how great it is. when he returns after the war, he soon finds that brooklyn is not so nice after all. he is able to share a place with nick, the janitor of his old high school, and get a job as a singer in a music store. he also meets leo, a talented pianist and his teacher anne, whose dream is to singing opera. when jamie arrives from england, danny tries to show him the brooklyn experience and help him compose modern swing music. together, these four also try to help leo get the brooklyn music scholarship.

title: Miss March
synopsis: a young man awakens from a four-year coma to hear that his once virginal high-school sweetheart has since become a centerfold in one of the world's most famous men's magazines. he and his sex-crazed best friend decide to take a cross-country road trip in order to crash a party at the magazine's legendary mansion headquarters and win back the girl.

title: The Education of Charlie Banks
synopsis: college student charlie banks has to face old problems when the bully he had an unpleasant encounter with back in high school shows up on his campus.

title: Leaving Barstow
synopsis: growing up in barstow, ca, high school senior andrew hopes for a bigger world -- but his devotion to his mother, sandra, and his awakening attraction to newcomer jenny, combine to keep him tied to home. andrew's loyalties become confused and his prior ambitions begin to fade as he realizes he must make the most difficult of all decisions -- choosing between himself and the people he loves.

title: Pretty Cool Too
synopsis: after graduating from high school, lovable geek walter (eric fagundes) receives a cell phone as a gift which could solve all of his problems. it comes with a personal genie that could control anyone, including walter's overprotective parents, his pesky brother, and sexy neighbors. with such incredible powers at his disposal, walter sets out to make his wildest dreams come true.

title: Porky's II: The Next Day
synopsis: when the students of angel beach high decide to stage "an evening with shakespeare," their efforts are threatened by miss balbricker, who views the works of shakespeare as obscene. she enlists the help of reverend bubba flavel, a religious fanatic who brings along his flock of followers to pressure the school into shutting down the production.

title: Underclassman
synopsis: a young detective goes undercover at an elite private school to destroy an international stolen car ring.

title: Van Wilder: Freshman Year
synopsis: it is freshman year at coolidge college and van wilder is ready to party. to his dismay, all the girls have taken a vow of chastity and the dean rules the school. van embarks on a crusade to land the campus hottie, kaitlin, and liberate his school from sexual oppression and party dysfunction.

title: Ninja Cheerleaders
synopsis: 3 college cheerleaders use their martial arts know-how to save their sensei from mafia kidnappers, but must keep their extra curricular activities a secret in order to make it into an ivy league school.

title: I Love You, Beth Cooper
synopsis: a valedictorian's declaration of love for a high-school cheerleader launches a night of revelry, reflection and romance for a group of graduating seniors.

title: Kiss the Bride
synopsis: in high school, matt and ryan were best friends. more than friends, actually. but in the ensuing ten years, they've lost contact. so when matt receives an invitation to ryan's wedding he's surprised - especially that ryan is marrying a woman!

title: State's Evidence
synopsis: six high school teenagers decide to commit suicide together, but their plans soon go awry when one of them has something darker in mind as well.
